00015         template <class T>
00016                 class NonBlockingQueue {
00017 
00018         public:
00019                 NonBlockingQueue();
00020                 virtual ~NonBlockingQueue();
00021 
00022                 bool empty();
00023                 size_t size();

00036 
00037         template<class T>
00038                 NonBlockingQueue<T>::~NonBlockingQueue() {
00039                 delete m_queue;
00040         }
00041 
00042         template<class T>
00043                 NonBlockingQueue<T>::NonBlockingQueue() {
00044                 m_queue = new std::queue<T>;
00045         }
00046 
00047         template<class T>
00048                 bool NonBlockingQueue<T>::empty() {
00049                 AutoMutex a(m_queueMutex);
00050                 return m_queue->empty();
00051         }
00052

00054                 size_t NonBlockingQueue<T>::size() {
00055                 AutoMutex a(m_queueMutex);
00056                 return m_queue->size();
00057         }
00058 
00059         template<class T>
00060                 void NonBlockingQueue<T>::push(T t) {
00061                 AutoMutex a(m_queueMutex);
00062                 m_queue->push(t);
00063         }
00064 
00065         template<class T>
00066                 T NonBlockingQueue<T>::pop() {
00067                 MT_EXCEPTION_ASSERT(!empty(), "Can't pop. The queue is empty.");
00068 
00069                 AutoMutex a(m_queueMutex);
00070                 T data = m_queue->front();
00071                 m_queue->pop();
00072                 return data;
00073         }
00074 }
